trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Net.Sockets" /> namespace provides a managed implementation of the Windows Sockets (Winsock) interface for developers who need to tightly control access to the network.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Net.Sockets" /> fornece uma implementação gerenciada da interface Winsock (Soquetes do Windows) para desenvolvedores que precisam controlar o acesso à rede.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>, and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> classes encapsulate the details of creating TCP and UDP connections to the Internet.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>, e <xref:System.Net.Sockets.UdpClient> classes encapsulam os detalhes da criação de conexões de TCP e UDP para a Internet.
